select puserid, prono, protitle, pname, gender, phone, paddr, skills, skillnos, skillnms, rn, cnt from ( select puserid, prono, protitle, pname, gender, phone, paddr, skills, skillnos, skillnms, rn, cnt from ( select a.puserid, a.prono, a.protitle, a.pname, a.gender, a.phone, a.paddr, b.skills, get_skillnos(a.puserid, a.prono) as skillnos, get_skillnms(a.puserid, a.prono) as skillnms, row_number() over(order by a.adate asc) as rn, case when ifnull(c.cnt, 0) > 0 then 1 else 0 end as cnt from resumetb a left outer join ( select a.puserid, a.prono, sum(b.skills) as skills from skilltb a inner join ( select skillno, skillnm, power(2, skillno - 1) as skills from showskilltb ) b on (a.sequeno = b.skillno) group by a.puserid, a.prono ) b on (a.puserid = b.puserid and a.prono = b.prono) left outer join ( select puserid, prono, count(*) as cnt from pcareertb group by puserid, prono ) c on (a.puserid = c.puserid and a.prono = c.prono) where representative = 1 ) as a
